instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.U7000: What is U7000? U7000 refers to the ISL6258 or ISL6259 charging IC on Macbooks from 2008-2012.

threads.title: water damaged board solved thank you
threads.message: I just fix today a core 2 duo board that I don't remember the model was like a 2009 , but I got cash out of it , I replace like 21 components , 2 mosfets , randoms resistors and caps around <CHIP>U7000</CHIP> and 3.4v inductor  and resistors  between others, I also a trace a wire because corroded paths , I didn't get like a lot of money but something is something , thank you for this forum , I hope you guys never re think and close it , because having the privilege to get answers here is amazing.
